title: Two diary workers have caught the H5N1 virus from cows, “the first...
content:
Two diary workers have caught the H5N1 virus from cows, “the first known instance globally of a person catching this version of bird flu from a mammal”. We are just playing with fire with this stuff, aren’t we? 🫣

💬 Join the discussion on kottke.org →
author: Jason Kottke
